profile: Made In The Shade Blinds and More Durham is a Total Window Treatment Solutions company.  We service residential and commercial window covering needs for the entire Durham Region area including Pickering, Uxbridge, Ajax, Whitby, Oshawa, Port Perry, Courtice and Bowmanville.  Our mobile showroom will come right to your house so you can view and sample our products from the comfort of your own home.  We offer a full range of blinds, shades, shutters and drapes from leading manufacturers such as Hunter Douglas, Shade-O-Matic, Graber and Horizons.  We offer free in-home consultations, window measuring and installation.  Let us earn your business and your trust.
service_area: Made in the Shade Blinds and More is a mobile window covering service and that means we are coming to ...
products: We offer only the highest quality of products in the industry such as Hunter Douglas, Shade O Matic, Graber/Springs, and Horizons.  We carry the full compliment of aluminum, wood, faux wood and now fabric blinds.  We carry sun shades, roller shades and roman shades. We carry shadings such as silhouette and shadow magic.  We carry vinyl, faux wood and wood shutters.  We also carry a unique line of hand painted blinds and shades to give you the unique and exact look you seek.
services: Our in-home shopping experience is second to none.  We bring the product samples to your home and do a great consultation in the comfort of your home.  We will measure all your windows and provide you with a quote you will love.  We will then order your custom made window coverings, deliver and install.
brands: We carry Hunter Douglas, Shadeomatic, Maxxmar, Graber and Horizons window fashions. We also carry an awesome line of Sphinx indoor and outdoor area rugs by Oriental Weavers.
specialities: For a real unique look to your window (and especially for retail and home businesses) Made in the Shade Blinds and More is pleased to offer hand painted window coverings.  We can hand paint anything from corporate logos to natural setting to artwork on coverings such as aluminum and faux wood blinds, vertical PVC blinds and roller and sun shades.
name: Made In The Shade Blinds And More Durham

profile:
Welcome to Budget Blinds of Peterborough. We're your local experts and are proud to be backed by the #1 provider of custom window coverings in North America that has provided design-driven solutions for over 25 years. With the highest levels of customer satisfaction, you'll have the peace of mind and security that comes with choosing the proven leader. We’ll get to know you and your unique style so we can deliver the perfect solution for your home. 

***

Explore what Beautiful can do for your windows. Contact us today to schedule your appointment. We’re looking forward to working with you.

profile:
Flex Custom Blinds is a turn key shop at home Window Covering  business that has been serving  the GTA and Ottawa  since 1985. We specialize in finding the perfect custom made window treatments to suit your lifestyle,taste and budget. 
Ask for our free at home consultation services. Motorization is our speciality


We offer a wide variety of blinds,shades, California shutters, drapery,romans, sliding panels, motorization, multi shades, silhouettes ,pirhouettes,speciality shapes and so much more
